content: <metadata>   <idinfo>     <citation>       <citeinfo>         <origin>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's office</origin>         <pubdate>20130724</pubdate>         <title>Subdivisions</title>         <geoform>vector digital data</geoform>       </citeinfo>     </citation>     <descript>       <abstract>There are two sources for the subdivision boundary layer. The first is a legacy shapefile of subdivision boundaries which was created and edited separately from the subdivision lots and ownership parcel layers. Due to the independent creation and maintenance of these layers, it is common to see line data separation between subdivision boundaries, lots, and parcels where no legal separation exists. Editing of this dataset more or less ceased at the end of 2010.Beginning in January 2011, new subdivisions have been created and maintained using the ESRI Parcel Fabric data model. In addition, as conditions permit, older subdivisions are re-drawn to original plat and/or City-resurveyed dimensions, and added to the Parcel Fabric dataset. When these older subdivisions are added to the Parcel Fabric, the legacy shapefile representation of the subdivision boundary is deleted.For display on the City website and download from the Open Data Catalog, these two sources are combined into one subdivision layer. Subdivisions based on the Parcel Fabric data model will have a SYSTEM_START_DATE value of January 2011 or later, and will be consistent with underlying lot and parcel data.</abstract>       <purpose>This layer portrays boundaries of subdivided lands within the City and County of Denver.  Denver-owned lands in other counties are not included in this dataset.</purpose>       <supplinf>This dataset is considered to be complete. Errors and omissions should be brought to the attention of the contact person for the metadata. The dataset is updated when new subdivisions are recorded by the Clerk and Recorder, or when older subdivisions are re-digitized to plat or City-resurvey dimensions.</supplinf>     </descript>     <status>       <update>Daily</update>     </status>     <spdom>       <bounding>         <westbc>-105.109967</westbc>         <eastbc>-104.734490</eastbc>         <northbc>39.827270</northbc>         <southbc>39.614309</southbc>       </bounding>     </spdom>     <keywords>       <theme>         <themekt>None</themekt>         <themekey>survey</themekey>         <themekey>property</themekey>       </theme>       <theme>         <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Categories</themekt>         <themekey>boundaries</themekey>         <themekey>planningCadastre</themekey>       </theme>       <place>         <placekt>None</placekt>         <placekey>Denver</placekey>         <placekey>Denver County</placekey>         <placekey>Colorado</placekey>         <placekey>USA</placekey>       </place>     </keywords>     <accconst>None</accconst>     <useconst>ACCESS CONSTRAINTS:   None. <latres>8.9831528411952133e-009</latres>         <longres>8.9831528411952133e-009</longres>         <geogunit>Decimal Degrees</geogunit>       </geograph>       <geodetic>         <horizdn>D WGS 1984</horizdn>         <ellips>WGS 1984</ellips>         <semiaxis>6378137.0</semiaxis>         <denflat>298.257223563</denflat>       </geodetic>     </horizsys>   </spref>   <eainfo>     <detailed>       <enttyp>         <enttypl>ENG_SRVSUBDIVISIONS_A</enttypl>       </enttyp>       <attr>         <attrlabl>OBJECTID</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Internal feature number.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SUBID99</attrlabl>         <attrdef>A unique identifier assigned by the City and County of Denver's City Surveyor's Office.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CRNO</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Clerk and Recorder's Reception Number.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver Clerk and Recorder</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CONSTYEAR</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Year of recordation of the subdivision.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver Clerk and Recorder</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SUBNAME</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The recorded name of the subdivision.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>ORD_YEAR</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The year of the ordinance or resolution creating the subdivision.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>ORD_NUMBER</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The number of the ordinance or resolution creating the subdivision.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>ORD_TYPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Indicates whether the subdivision was created by ordinance or by resolution.  Subdivisions have been created by resolution since approximately October of 2006.  Before that, subdivisions were created by ordinance.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>DOCUMENT_NUMBER</attrlabl>         <attrdef>A concatenation of ORD_YEAR, ORD_NUMBER, and ORD_TYPE.  This number matches the Adobe .pdf file name format used by the Denver Clerk and Recorder's office when imaging subdivision ordinances and resolutions.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver Clerk and Recorder</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CLERK_NUMBER</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The is a number that was once used by the Denver Clerk and Recorder to index subdivision plats.  These numbers are no longer issued, but have historical research value.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver Clerk and Recorder</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CR_BOOK</attrlabl>         <attrdef>For subdivisions platted prior to 1987, this is the Denver Clerk and Recorder book number.  Since 1987, the Clerk and Recorder has issued reception numbers to these recorded documents, although there are instances where both reception numbers AND book/page combinations were issued in the late 1980s and early 1990s. </attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver Clerk and Recorder</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>CR_PAGE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>For subdivisions platted prior to 1987, this is the Denver Clerk and Recorder page number.  Since 1987, the Clerk and Recorder has issued reception numbers to these recorded documents, although there are instances where both reception numbers AND book/page combinations were issued in the late 1980s and early 1990s.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver Clerk and Recorder</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SURVEY_RECORD</attrlabl>         <attrdef>The Denver City Surveyor's Lot Survey Index page number for the subdivision.  The City Surveyor's office ceased individual private property lot surveys sometime in the 1950s, but these index numbers do have historical research value.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver City Surveyor's Office</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>RECEPTION_NUMBER</attrlabl>         <attrdef>For subdivisions created since about 1987, the reception number issued to the creating document by the Denver Clerk and Recorder.  Prior to 1987, these documents were issued a Clerk and Recorder Book and Page number (see CR_BOOK and CR_PAGE).  Note: Some subdivisions annexed from Arapahoe County since 1902 may contain both and Clerk and Recorder Book and Page Number AND a reception number.  In these instances, the reception number is likely that issued by Arapahoe County when the subdivision was originally created.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>City and County of Denver Clerk and Recorder</attrdefs>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>GLOBALID</attrlabl>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SHAPE</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Feature geometry.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Coordinates defining the features.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SHAPE_Length</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Length of feature in internal units.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>       <attr>         <attrlabl>SHAPE_Area</attrlabl>         <attrdef>Area of feature in internal units squared.</attrdef>         <attrdefs>ESRI</attrdefs>         <attrdomv>           <udom>Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.</udom>         </attrdomv>       </attr>     </detailed>   </eainfo>   <distinfo>     <distrib>       <cntinfo>         <cntorgp>           <cntorg>City and County of Denver, Technology Services / Enterprise Data Management</cntorg>         </cntorgp>         <cntaddr>           <addrtype>unknown</addrtype>           <address>201 W Colfax Ave, Dept 301</address>           <city>Denver</city>           <state>CO</state>           <postal>80202</postal>           <country>USA</country>         </cntaddr>         <cntfax>720-913-5237</cntfax>         <cntemail>denvergis@denvergov.oeg</cntemail>         <hours> M-F 8:00am - 4:30pm (MT)</hours>       </cntinfo>     </distrib>     <distliab>See access and use constraints information.</distliab>   </distinfo>   <metainfo>     <metd>20150319</metd>     <metstdn>FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata</metstdn>     <metstdv>FGDC-STD-001-1998</metstdv>     <mettc>local time</mettc>   </metainfo> </metadata>
